item.description:
Who's interested in a Game Night?

We've found a well-lit, conveniently-located venue - the Brighton branch of the Boston Public Library! http://www.bpl.org/branches/brighton.htm

There's a parking lot, and it's about a 5 minute walk from the 57, 86, and 65 bus stops, (Take the Green Line to Kenmore Station. Take Bus #57 and get off at Brighton Center. Walk up Academy Hill Road; the library is next to the Court House.)

 

If you want to bring games, that'd be great - I'll bring a few fun ones (Apples to Apples, Cards Against Humanity, etc.) and we can decide what to play when we get there...

 

We can bring snacks & drinks, but please, nothing too messy.  It IS a library, after all! :-) Also, there is no alcohol allowed on the premises.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Meeting Room
item.name: Game night!
